data.title: Robert Allen Bodine, Sr.
data.text: Husband: Robert Allen Bodine, Sr. Born: Nov 16 1912 in Yonkers, Westchester Co., NY 1 Died: Apr 16 1971 in Radnor, Delaware Co., PA 2 Buried: in W. Laurel Hill Cem., Bala Cynwyd, Montgomery Co., PA Father: Allen Griffith Bodine (1878 - 1924) Mother: Emma 'Dorothy' Carson (1878 - 1950) Other spouse 2 Notes Wife: Jane Thomas Williams Married: Jun 28 1941 in Radnor, Delaware Co., PA Born: 1916 in Pennsylvania Died: Jun 25 1965 in Radnor, Delaware Co., PA Buried: in W. Laurel Hill Cem., Bala Cynwyd, Montgomery Co., PA Father: David T. Williams Notes F Child 1: Living Born: (details excluded) Husband: Richard Allen Sparks, Sr. b. Aug 30 1934 d. Apr 20 2001 F Child 2: Elizabeth Bodine + M Child 3: Robert ("Bob") Allen Bodine, Jr. Born: Apr 26 1949 in Lewes, Sussex Co., DE Died: Oct 4 2006 in Hinsdale, Berkshire Co., MA Buried: in Maple Street Cemetery, Hinsdale, Berkshire Co., MA Wife: Living b. (details excluded) Wife: Living b. (details excluded) Notes Sources: (1) Social Security Death Index - date. (2) Social Security Death Index - date & place. I think this says Wayne, PA. RB has Radnor, Delaware Co., PA. Dave's Bodine Genealogy Website Email me with Revisions. Pictures welcome if under 1 MB. Click here to return to the Home Page. Click here to email me. Name Index
